15  void LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::set_num_subconditions()
16  {
17  if(
18  __powerlaw_index == 0
19  ||
20  __powerlaw_index == __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks.size()
21  )
22  __num_subconditions = 1;
23  else
24  __num_subconditions = 2;
25  }
26 
27  LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition(
28  BrokenPowerlawPhaseLagZone &zone,
29  const DissipatingBody &body,
30  const DissipatingBody &other_body,
31  int orbital_frequency_multiplier,
32  int spin_frequency_multiplier
33  ) :
34  __orbital_frequency_multiplier(orbital_frequency_multiplier),
35  __spin_frequency_multiplier(spin_frequency_multiplier),
36  __zone(zone),
37  __body(body),
38  __other_body(other_body),
39  __term_index(
40  __zone.tidal_term_index(orbital_frequency_multiplier,
41  spin_frequency_multiplier)
42  ),
43  __powerlaw_index(__zone.__tidal_indices[__term_index])
44  {
45  set_num_subconditions();
46  }
47 
48  std::valarray<double> LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::operator()(
49  Core::EvolModeType
50 #ifndef NDEBUG
51  evol_mode
52 #endif
53  ,
54  const std::valarray<double> &orbit,
55  const std::valarray<double> &,
56  std::valarray<double> &stop_deriv
57  ) const
58  {
59  assert(evol_mode == Core::BINARY);
60  double semimajor;
61  if(
62  __body.number_locked_zones()
63  ||
64  __other_body.number_locked_zones()
65  )
66  semimajor = orbit[0];
67  else if(orbit[0] < 0)
68  throw Core::Error::Runtime("Negitave a^6.5 encountered!");
69  else semimajor = std::pow(orbit[0], 1.0 / 6.5);
70 
71  double orbital_frequency = Core::orbital_angular_velocity(
72  __body.mass(),
73  __other_body.mass(),
74  semimajor
75  );
76 
77  double abs_forcing_frequency = std::abs(
78  __zone.forcing_frequency(
79  __orbital_frequency_multiplier,
80  __spin_frequency_multiplier,
81  orbital_frequency
82  )
83  );
84  std::valarray<double> result(__num_subconditions);
85  size_t above_index;
86  if(__powerlaw_index == 0)
87  above_index = 0;
88  else {
89  double critical_frequency =
90  __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks[__powerlaw_index - 1];
91 
92  result[0] = ((abs_forcing_frequency - critical_frequency)
93  /
94  critical_frequency);
95  above_index = 1;
96  }
97  if(__powerlaw_index < __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks.size()) {
98  double critical_frequency =
99  __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks[__powerlaw_index];
100 
101  result[above_index] = (
102  (abs_forcing_frequency - critical_frequency)
103  /
104  critical_frequency
105  );
106  }
107  stop_deriv.resize(__num_subconditions, Core::NaN);
108  return result;
109  }
110 
111  void LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::reached(
112  short
113 #ifndef NDEBUG
114  deriv_sign
115 #endif
116  ,
117  unsigned index
118  )
119  {
120  assert(index < __num_subconditions);
121 
122  if(__powerlaw_index > 0 && index == 0) {
123  assert(deriv_sign == -1);
124  --__powerlaw_index;
125  --__zone.__tidal_indices[__term_index];
126  } else {
127  assert(deriv_sign == 1);
128  assert(__powerlaw_index < __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks.size());
129 
130  ++__powerlaw_index;
131  ++__zone.__tidal_indices[__term_index];
132 
133  assert(__zone.__tidal_indices[__term_index]
134  <
135  __zone.__tidal_frequency_powers.size());
136  }
137 
138  set_num_subconditions();
139 
140  }
141 
142  short LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::expected_crossing_deriv_sign(
143  unsigned index
144  ) const
145  {
146  if(index == 1 || __powerlaw_index == 0) {
147  assert(__powerlaw_index
148  <
149  __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks.size());
150  return 1;
151  } else {
152  return -1;
153  }
154  }
155 
156  std::string LagForcingFrequencyBreakCondition::describe(int index) const
157  {
158  std::ostringstream description;
159  description << "Forcing frequency leaving the interval ";
160  if(__powerlaw_index > 0 && index <= 0) {
161  description
162  << __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks[__powerlaw_index - 1]
163  << " < ";
164  }
165  description << "|"
166  << __orbital_frequency_multiplier
167  << "Worb"
168  << (__spin_frequency_multiplier > 0 ? " - " : " + ")
169  << std::abs(__spin_frequency_multiplier)
170  << "Wspin|";
171  if(
172  __powerlaw_index < __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks.size()
173  &&
174  (
175  index < 0
176  ||
177  index == static_cast<int>(__num_subconditions) - 1
178  )
179  ) {
180  description << " < "
181  << __zone.__tidal_frequency_breaks[__powerlaw_index];
182  }
183  return description.str();
184  }
